item.title: How to set up webpage using HUGO, Netlify, and Git
item.author: Author
item.description: I am setting up my first webpage with Hugo and Netlify This is my first time using a static website builder. So far I have used to built pages with WordPress. I followed the recommendation of a friend and the promise of a simple to use and shiny new open-source tool to set up this site. For getting you started, it actually only takes a hand full of commands in your terminal.
